name: moody

effect.scarlet_violet: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
effect.the_teal_mask: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
effect.the_indigo_disk: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
effect.legends_za: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.

short_effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Every turn, one of the Pokémon's stats will be boosted sharply but another stat will be lowered.
